::Lavatron::

The blade hit Lavatron in the forearm, but he turned his hadn and 
grabbed Surgital's wrist, yanking hard while sending a bolt of 
electricity into it. He ignores the pain coming from his arm.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> ::Surgital::
> 
>      Surgital had to strike fast before Lavatron got out of the 
net.  Firing a blade wouldn't be too smart, as it would cut the net.  
Hmm.  Aha!  This would take some accuracy.  Surgital converted his 
spinning saw into a sharp knife, and stabbed at Lavatron through one 
of the gaps in the energon rope of the net.
